N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 540.3 - Hospital forensic committee

State Regulations
(a) Each office facility shall establish a hospital forensic committee consisting
of three persons appointed by the clinical director. (b) Each member of the committee shall be a
clinician licensed in New York State to practice medicine, psychology or social
work. (c) At least one member of
the committee shall be a board-certified psychiatrist. (d) The committee shall review applications
for authorization of the granting of escorted or unescorted furlough to
patients, transfer of patients, conversion of patients to civil status, and
discharge or conditional release of patients, or return of patients to the
custody of the criminal court, in accordance with the procedures described in
section
540.9
(h) of this
